00007 #define NINT 11
00008 #define NFLOAT 0
00009 #define NDOUBLE 0
00010 
00011 using namespace lcio ;
00012 
00013 namespace CALICE {
00014 
00015 class AdcBlock ;
00016 
00017   typedef int AdcBlockArray[6];
00018 
00034 class AdcBlock : public LCFixedObject<NINT,NFLOAT,NDOUBLE> {
00035   
00036 public: 
00037   
00038   AdcBlock() {};
00039 
00042   AdcBlock(int boardID, int label, int Fe, int Imul, const AdcBlockArray &adcBlock, int status) {
00043 
00044     obj()->setIntVal( 0 , boardID  ) ;
00045     obj()->setIntVal( 1 , label  ) ;
00046     obj()->setIntVal( 2 , Fe  ) ;
00047     obj()->setIntVal( 3 , Imul ) ;  
00048     for (int iadc = 0; iadc < 6; iadc++) {
00049       obj()->setIntVal(4+iadc, adcBlock[iadc]);
00050     }
00051     obj()->setIntVal( 10 ,  status ) ;  
00052   }
00053 
00056   AdcBlock(LCObject* obj) : LCFixedObject<NINT,NFLOAT,NDOUBLE>(obj) { } 
00057 
00059   virtual ~AdcBlock() { /* no op*/  }
00060   
00063   unsigned int getBoardID() const {
00064     return getIntVal(0);
00065   }
00066 
00071   unsigned getElecChannel(int) const;
00072 
00075   short getAdcVal(int i) const {
00076     //    int mod=i%2;
00077     int ipos = 4 + i/2;
00078   
00079     if ((i & 1)==0) return (getIntVal(ipos) >> 16) & 0xffff;
00080     else        return (getIntVal(ipos) >> 0) & 0xffff;
00081   };
00082 
00083 
00086   short getBoardFrontEnd() const {
00087     return (short) ( (getIntVal(2) >> 0) & 0xff);
00088   };
00089 
00092   short getMultiplexPosition() const {
00093     return (short) ( (getIntVal(3) >> 0) & 0xff);
00094   }
00095 
00100   short getCrateID() const {
00101     return (short) ( (getIntVal(0) >> 16) & 0xff);
00102   };
00103 
00106   short getSlotID() const {
00107     return (short) ( (getIntVal(0) >> 8) & 0xff);
00108   };
00109 
00112   short getBoardComponentNumber() const {
00113     return (short) ( (getIntVal(0) >> 0) & 0xff);
00114   };
00115 
00118   short getRecordLabel() const {
00119     return (short) ( (getIntVal(1) >> 0) & 0xff);
00120   };
00121 
00124   short getTransmissionStatus() const { return getIntVal( 10 );}
00125   
00128   void print(  std::ostream& os, int ) ;
00129   
00130 
00131   // -------- need to implement abstract methods from LCGenericObject
00132 
00135   const std::string getTypeName() const { 
00136     return"AdcBlock" ;
00137   } 
00138   
00141   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00142     return "i:CrateID/SlotID,i:RecordLabel,i:Fe:,i:Imul,i[6]:AdcVals,i:TransissionStatus" ;
00143   }
